Row.Text: Your people look back upon your rule during the {1_Desc} with careful reflection...
But your reign, it seems, was unremarkable.

Replace.Text: Your recent actions have generated [COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]Epithet Progress[ENDCOLOR]!

Row.Text: Your people have commemorated your rule during the previous Era with a new Epithet: you are now known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]{1_Desc}.[ENDCOLOR]'
The {1_Desc} people have commemorated the rule of their leader {2_Desc} with a new Epithet: they are now known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]{3_Desc}.[ENDCOLOR]'

Your [ICON_JFD_EPITHET_PROGRESS] Progress toward earning an Epithet upon entering into the next Era.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Increase this Progress by building Wonders, earning Great People, conquering and razing cities, clearing Barbarian Camps, starting Golden Ages and WLTKDs, and spending Faith and Gold.
